data.title: P. D. Q. Bach has joined the great heavenly orchestra
data.text:
We have lost a great master - Peter Schickele - who has passed away. The last great Bach scion is not any more with us. He left us great masterpieces such as the 1712 Overture and Other Musical Assaults and the oratorio The Seasonings.

We shall miss you, and, please do not let any post-humorous manuscripts be found.

-Hannu

RIP, PDQ (GNU).

--

DigiCom, a.k.a | https://www.fanfiction.net/u/5295375/The-Plot-Mechanic/

The Plot Mechanic | https://archiveofourown.org/users/ThePlotMechanic

I loved his music when I discovered it in Uni, but it's been years since I even thought of it

Time to go on youtube for a run in to history!

toggle quoted message Show quoted text

We have lost a great master - Peter Schickele - who has passed away. The last great Bach scion is not any more with us. He left us great masterpieces such as the 1712 Overture and Other Musical Assaults and the oratorio The Seasonings.

We shall miss you, and, please do not let any post-humorous manuscripts be found.

-Hannu

This is quite the sniff worthy one.

Such a gift, can hear his voice in my head as i type.

Hope NPR does something special for him!
